column4: I used this instruction: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Grub2#Creating_the_Custom_Menu and I have file like this: http://pastebin.com/P7W6JLsL What should I write to make the system boot without any window manager?
you need to add 'text' to the kernel line in /etc/default/grub... the GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT entry
